body:
Hi:
* Thank you for your feedback, we have received your issue, Please wait patiently for a reply.
* In order for us to understand your request as soon as possible, please provide detailed information、version or pictures.
* If you haven't received a reply for a long time, you can subscribe to the developer's email，Mail subscription steps reference https://dolphinscheduler.apache.org/en-us/community/development/subscribe.html ,Then write the issue URL in the email content and send question to dev@dolphinscheduler.apache.org.
@songjianet @labbomb PTAL, I notice that we have ui-next module, should I also change ui-next module code?

> @songjianet @labbomb PTAL, I notice that we have ui-next module, should I also change ui-next module code?

Yes, the refactored project will be developed with reference to the existing project completely, and if there are minor problems, it will be repaired in the refactored project.
But I could not find any content like `create time` or `.createTime` in `UI-NEXT` module. So I do not know which line should I change. Could you give some hints for me? @songjianet

> But I could not find any content like `create time` or `.createTime` in `UI-NEXT` module. So I do not know which line should I change. Could you give some hints for me? @songjianet

There is no formal development of business functions yet.

### What happened

In the deployment document of lastest (2.0.1), the description of the mysql driver version is inconsistent
